'''1.5.2''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released on July 24-25, 2018,<ref>{{tweet|Mega_Spud|1021826067059888133|The Minecraft hotfix version 1.5.2.1 is rolling out now!|July 24, 2018}}</ref> which fixes bugs.<ref name=changelog>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360008485871|title=Minecraft - 1.5.2 (Bedrock)|date=July 24, 2018}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue regarding the Marketplace bitmap causing low-end devices to crash.
* Fixed a crash that sometimes occurred during startup.</onlyinclude>
